content: row 18 knit row 19 k2 purl to within last 2 stitches k2 row 20-22 knit cast off knitwise until 2 stitches remain knit those 2 stitches together then bind off last stitch this will give you a nice square edge at the bottom weave in ends if desired sew on tiny buttons you can just push the buttons through the stitches no button holes needed or leave the cardigan open with the buttons serving as decoration only 2 pattern starts here for long sleeved version with #1 needles cast on 20 stitches row 1 knit row 2 knit 3 stitches place marker on needle front knit 4 more stitches place marker on needle sleeve knit 6 stitches place marker on needle back knit 4 stitches place marker on needle sleeve knit 3 remaining stitches front row 3 k to within 2 stitches of marker kfb k1 slip marker k1 kfb in next stitch repeat directions in brackets 3 more times k to end of row 28 sts row 4 k2 purl slipping markers in this and all other purl row to last 2 stitches k2 row 5-12 repeat row 3 & 4 until there are 16 stitches between markers for back 60 sts note knit sleeves before finishing the body of the cardigan sleeves row will be counted for sleeves only i offer two ways of handling the stitch holders either option a or option b choose the one that seems most comfortable to you for years i did option a then one day i only had two safety pins with me and did option b i found that i much prefer that method for some reason first sleeve sleeve row 1 knit to the first marker increasing as normal place those already-knitted stitches with the marker on a stitch holder i put a different colored stitch marker on this stitch holder so that when i knit the body i can tell which stitches have been knitted already option a knit across 14 sleeve stitches remove marker place 16 back stitches on another stitch holder remove marker place next 14 sleeve stitches on another holder and place remaining 9 front stitches along with the marker on a third stitch holder both sets of front stitches should have the only markers make sure they are different colors so you can tell which one you ve already knitted this consists of sleeve row 1 continue with sleeve row 2 below or option b knit across the 14 sleeve stitches remove the marker turn and continue with row 2 leaving the back other sleeve and front stitches on the needle as you finish knitting the sleeve sleeve row 2 purl working on sleeve stitches only sleeve row 3 knit sleeve row 4 purl sleeve row 5 k2 together k10 k2 together 12 sts 3 sleeve row 6-9 repeat sleeve row 2 & 3 sleeve row 10 & 11 k1 p1 ribbing across row sleeve row 12 bind off evenly in ribbing leaving
